name: Foursome Investments
overview: Foursome Investments is an ethical investment group specializing in start-up and development-stage growth businesses in Europe and North America that do good. The investment management company operates two funds: The FourVision Fund, targeting early-stage investment opportunities residing in the environmental technology sector; and The Foursome Cleantech Fund, focusing on investments in the water technology arena. Foursome’s portfolio includes Exosect, a developer of green pest control technologies, Quay Technologies, a maker of water purification technology, and Inetec, a manufacturer of organic waste equipment.
